meanings.sent1: The snowslide covered the entire mountain in a thick blanket of snow.
meanings.sent2: We had to evacuate the area due to the dangerous snowslide.
meanings.sent3: The snowslide decided to take a detour and ended up in the middle of the ski resort!
meanings.sent4: The snowslide roared down the mountain like a hungry beast devouring everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The sheer force of the snowslide was both terrifying and mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: To slide or fall down a slope of snow.
meanings.sent1: I watched in awe as the snowslide gracefully descended the hill.
meanings.sent2: The children love to snowslide down the small slope in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The penguin attempted to snowslide on its belly but ended up tumbling down instead!
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts seemed to snowslide uncontrollably, one after the other.
meanings.sent5: The skier expertly maneuvered through the snowslide, enjoying every moment of the descent.
